description: When I was studying at State Vocational High School 4 Semarang, I joined the Youth Red Cross extracurricular activity. I had the opportunity to serve as a committee member for a blood donation event, attend seminars, and represent my school in the Semarang city-wide Youth Red Cross organization. I also took a professional certification test in the field of pneumatics.

During my studies at Polytechnic State of Semarang, I joined the student activity unit called the Polytechnic Computer Club. I gained experience by participating in the Goes to Public program and served as the club's treasurer. I was also a recipient of the Indonesia Smart Card for College (KIP-K) scholarship program.
